title.rendered: Microsoft Teams: Top Security Tips to Boost Productivity

content.rendered:
Microsoft Teams: Top Security Tips to Boost Productivity

Remote working and COVID-19 have vastly accelerated the use of Microsoft Teams over the last two years; a real game-changer for remote teams. MS Teams does have a number of security vulnerabilities that businesses need to understand and address.

Join us to learn the benefits & risks, how to effectively secure the tool & best practices to boost productivity in an actual business setting.

You’ll learn:

• Why MS Teams is not a data storage tool & is more powerful than just a method of chatting

• The benefits & risks associated with MS Teams

• Security tips to limit threat risk

• How to effectively manage group creation & access for top-notch collaboration
